data.name: MainWindow_StatusBarUpdate_ClickToUpdate
data.value: Haga clic aquí para actualizar ahora

data.name: Options_DeckWindows_CheckBox_HsForeground
data.value: Solo si HS está en primer plano

data.value: Ocultar si HS está en segundo plano

data.name: Options_Overlay_General_CheckBox_NoResetAfterGame
data.value: Don't reset decks after a game

data.name: Options_Overlay_General_CheckBox_FlavorText
data.value: Show card flavor text on mouseover (board/hand)

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_Label_Freezing
data.value: May cause the cursor to freeze occasionally

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_CheckBox_ForceOn
data.value: Force on (don't use this unless you need to)

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_CheckBox_FriendsList
data.value: Hide deck when friendslist is open

data.name: Options_Overlay_Interactivity_Label_Note
data.value: NOTE: May not work correctly if "options > overlay > general > automatically gray out secrets" is enabled.

data.name: Options_Overlay_Player_CheckBox_IncludeCreated
data.value: Include cards created in hand (e.g. The Coin)

data.name: Options_Overlay_Streaming_Text1
data.value: This will add a chroma-key-able copy of the overlay behind your Hearthstone window.

data.name: Options_Overlay_Streaming_Text2
data.value: Note: The overlay copy may show up in front of Hearthstone once. Clicking it will hide it for the rest of the session.

data.name: Options_Tracker_Appearance_CheckBox_RarityFrames
data.value: Colorear marcos de cartas según rareza

data.name: Options_Tracker_Appearance_CheckBox_RarityGems
data.value: Colorear gemas de cartas según rareza

data.name: Options_Tracker_Appearance_CheckBox_RedGreenStats
data.value: Texto rojo/verde en resumen de estadísticas

data.name: Options_Tracker_Backups_Text_Description
data.value: Las copias de seguridad se crean automáticamente en el primer inicio de cada día. Contienen mazos, juegos y configuración. Si hay mas de 7 copias (Autogeneradas), las mas antiguas son eliminadas automáticamente, dejando las de la última semana.

data.name: Options_Tracker_Backups_Button_BackupDir
data.value: Mostrar carpeta de copias de seguridad

data.name: Options_Tracker_Exporting_CheckBox_Version
data.value: Incluir número de versión en el nombre

data.name: Options_Tracker_Exporting_CheckBox_ClearSearchbox
data.value: Forzar limpieza de cuadro de búsqueda entre cartas

data.name: Options_Tracker_Exporting_CheckBox_Dialog
data.value: Mostrar cuadro de diálogo antes de exportar

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_Font
data.value: Usar fuente por defecto para idiomas no-latinos

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_Label_Restart
data.value: Reiniciar para aplicar los cambios de idioma.

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_AutoUse
data.value: "USAR" mazos automáticamente (Desactiva los botones en los mazos)

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_Sorting
data.value: Orden de cartas: Cartas de clase primero

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_FullTextSearch
data.value: Búsqueda por texto completo en constructor de mazos

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_UpperCaseDeckNames
data.value: Usar mayúsculas para nombres de mazos

data.name: Options_Tracker_General_CheckBox_AutoArchiveArena
data.value: Archivar mazos de Arena cuando han terminado

data.name: Options_Tracker_Importing_Constructed_Description
data.value: Esto comprobará si hay nuevos mazos o modificaciones cada vez que entre en el menú "Jugar".

data.name: Options_Tracker_Importing_Label_ArenaTemplates
data.value: Plantilla de nombre de mazos de Arena

data.name: Options_Tracker_Notifications_Label_ArenaReward
data.value: Mostrar la ventana de recompensa de Arena cuando esta termina

data.name: Options_Tracker_Notifications_Label_NoteDialog
data.value: Mostrar ventana de nota después de partida

data.name: Options_Tracker_Replays_Claim_Description
data.value: Inicie sesión con sus credenciales de Battle.net en HSReplay.net para reclamar sus repeticiones existentes. Se abrirá su navegador de Internet.

data.name: Options_Tracker_Settings_Analytics_Description
data.value: Esto sólo rastrea información muy básica para ayudarnos a mejorar HDT, como aplicación e inicios de partidas.

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_DiscardNoMatch
data.value: Descartar partida si las cartas no coinciden con el mazo

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_KeepStatsWhenDeleting
data.value: Mantener estadísticas cuando se eliminar un mazo*

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_KeepStatsWhenDeleting_Tooltip
data.value: Esto moverá las estadísticas al "mazo por defecto de la clase" (El mismo donde se guardan las partidas en modo no-mazo). Esto significa, las estadísticas de Arena se perderán cuando se borren los mazos de Arena!

data.name: Options_Tracker_Stats_CheckBox_StatsWindow
data.value: Mostrar estadísticas de mazos en ventana separada

data.name: Stats_Arena_Advanced_Warning
data.value: These charts render a bit slow. Press refresh to update them.

data.name: Stats_Constructed_Games_Button_AddGame
data.value: Añadir nueva partida al mazo activo

data.name: Stats_Constructed_Filters_CheckBox_TagFilters_Tooltip
data.value: Aplicar los filtros de etiqueta actualmente definidos en "Selección de mazo > Ordenar/Filtar mazos" (Botón con 2 flechas).

data.value: Start Hearthstone and enter the 'Play' menu.

data.name: Importing_Constructed_Text_StartHearthstoneBrawl
data.value: Start Hearthstone and enter the 'Tavern Brawl' menu.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text_General
data.value: The number of copies left in the deck for a specific card.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text_Draw
data.value: The chance of drawing a card with X copies left in the deck.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text1_Holding
data.value: The chance of your opponent holding a card at the start of the next turn with X copies left in play.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Percentages_Text2_Holding
data.value: This includes the next draw but nothing beyond that.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_Text_Intro
data.value: Almost everything in the overlay can be turn on or off, moved and resized.

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_OnOff_Text
data.value: Options for this can be found under

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_Unlock_Text1
data.value: The overlay can be unlocked via

data.name: Help_Overlay_Customization_Hyperlink
data.value: Additional information can be found here.

data.name: Help_BugsFeatures_Option1_Text2
data.value: If there's no issue on the topic feel free to open a new one and/or even fix it yourself and create a pull request. For some further information on what you might want to include in the issue

data.name: Help_BugsFeatures_Option2_Text_Email
data.value: 2) Send an email to support@hsdecktracker.net (English only)

data.name: Help_Github_Text3
data.value: contiene una breve descripción de todas las características.

data.value: El próximo robo infringe daño de fatiga de:

data.value: Cartas no encontradas en el mazo:

data.name: CrashDialog_Text
data.value: To help us find a solution for this issue, please attach a description of what you were doing just before this crash occurred, as well as any other helpful information you can think of.

data.value: cards played do not match the selected deck

data.value: Ocurrió un problema al actualizar el archivo log.config

data.name: MessageDialogs_LogConfig_Description1
data.value: Se requieren nuevas configuraciones en el archivo log.config para que HDT funcione correctamente.

data.name: MessageDialogs_LogConfig_Description3
data.value: Si eso no ayuda, haga clic en "Mostrar instrucciones" para ver como actualizarlo manualmente.

data.value: Muchas traducciones aun no existen o están en proceso. Si quieres ayudar, puedes hacerlo aquí:

data.name: DeckSetIcons_Tooltip_Msg
data.value: Deck contains cards from the Mean Streets of Gadgetzan expansion.

data.name: Enum_ConfigWarning_AutoDeckDetection
data.value: Automatic deck selection is currently disabled.\n\nIt's recommended to enable this setting for HDT to work best.

data.name: Enum_ConfigWarning_ConstructedAutoImportNew
data.value: Automatic importing of new Constructed decks is currently disabled.\n\nIt's recommended to enable this setting for HDT to work best.

data.name: Enum_ConfigWarning_ConstructedAutoUpdate
data.value: Automatic importing of changes to Constructed decks is currently disabled.\n\nIt's recommended to enable this setting for HDT to work best.

data.name: Enum_ConfigWarning_SelectedArenaImportingBehaviour
data.value: Automatic importing of Arena decks is currently disabled.\n\nIt's recommended to enable this setting for HDT to work best.

data.value: Displays the created/returned card, if the information is available.

data.name: Options_Overlay_General_CheckBox_FlavorText_Tooltip
data.value: Will only appear if the cursor stays still on a card for a short period of time.

data.name: Options_Overlay_General_CheckBox_BatteryStatus_Tooltip
data.value: Works for mobile devices (Laptop, Tablet, ...) only.

data.name: Options_Overlay_Opponent_CheckBox_CenterVertically_Tooltip
data.value: Center cards and information panels vertically within the selected region for the deck. Region can be changed via 'overlay > general > unlock'.

data.name: Options_Overlay_Player_CheckBox_CenterVertically_Tooltip
data.value: Center cards and information panels vertically within the selected region for the deck. Region can be changed via 'overlay > general > unlock'.

data.value: Uncheck to disable most animations for popup dialogs and flyouts
